ValidationRule.description: The start date of a project task cannot be a Non Working day
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (MOD(project_cloud__Autonomous_Start__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) = 0 && NOT(project_cloud__IsWorking_Sunday__c)) || (MOD(project_cloud__Autonomous_Start__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) = 1 && NOT(project_cloud__IsWorking_Monday__c)) || (MOD(project_cloud__Autonomous_Start__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) = 2 && NOT(project_cloud__IsWorking_Tuesday__c)) || (MOD(project_cloud__Autonomous_Start__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) = 3 && NOT(project_cloud__IsWorking_Wednesday__c)) || (MOD(project_cloud__Autonomous_Start__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) = 4 && NOT(project_cloud__IsWorking_Thursday__c)) || (MOD(project_cloud__Autonomous_Start__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) = 5 && NOT(project_cloud__IsWorking_Friday__c)) || (MOD(project_cloud__Autonomous_Start__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) = 6 && NOT(project_cloud__IsWorking_Saturday__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot Start Before Date must be a Working Day
